Interface HttpLocaleResolver

All Superinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:

@Indexed(HttpLocaleResolver.class) public interface HttpLocaleResolver extends LocaleResolver<HttpRequest<?>>
Responsible for determining the current locale from a request.
